import React from "react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import { FcGoogle } from "react-icons/fc"; export default function LoginPage({ handleGoogleLogin, handleEmailLogin }) { return (

Welcome to My Diary

Please login to continue

{/* Google Login */}
); }
